text: Asbjørn Solberg (27 December 1893 - 23 June 1977) was a Norwegian politician for the Christian Democratic Party. He was born in Oslo. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Østfold in 1945, and was re-elected on three occasions. He later served in the position of deputy representative during the term 1961-1965\. Solberg was a member of Degernes municipality council between 1945 and 1947, serving as mayor in 1945. In 1945 he was also a member of Østfold county council. ==References== * Category:1893 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Christian Democratic Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Asbjørn Solberg
